getLiveResults().details: getLiveResults a view function to see the current results active election.

getWinnerResults().details: getWinnerResults a view function to see who the winner of the active election is.

registerCandidate(string).details: registerCandidate allows anyone to sign up as a candidate in an active election.

startElection(uint256,uint256).details: startElection start a new election passing in a _registrationEndPeriod and a _votingEndPeriod. This also allows starting a new election if the conditions allow it.

voteForCandidate(uint256).details: voteForCandidate allows anyone to vote for a candidate in the current active election.
